channel.title: Dedicated server!
channel.description: I have a godaddy dedicated server and I can run the server on it just fine but if i close the SSH client the server goes offline... Anyhelp?

item.title: Dedicated server!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

[quote=“life-scape, post:2, topic:175045”]Yeah, you have to keep the SSH client up. Runescape does, but they pay somebody to host it 24/7. Same with E-bay, etc.

So you should probably keep it up, but if it slows your computer down, download a program to restart your computer at a certain time every day. My suggestion would be 3AM so if there is any people playing, there wont be many, and it will only take a minute.[/quote]

You do not know what ur talking about, i figured it out!

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated server!
item.dc:creator: @life-scape life-scape
item.description:
@life-scape wrote:

Yeah, you have to keep the SSH client up. Runescape does, but they pay somebody to host it 24/7. Same with E-bay, etc.

So you should probably keep it up, but if it slows your computer down, download a program to restart your computer at a certain time every day. My suggestion would be 3AM so if there is any people playing, there wont be many, and it will only take a minute.

Read full topic
